---
title: "Ghost Crab Burrow Dimension Analysis"
output: ioslides_presentation

## Concept
Exploration of the Ghost Crab's burrow dimensions and burrow morphology




## Project Goals 
1. Load data from [Ghost Crab Burrow Morphology and Distribution](https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6895109) 
2. Select and filter through burrow dimensions data 
2. Plot and graph selected data




## Required Packages for R
- Tidyverse
- Magrittr
- Knitr
```{r load-packages, message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(magrittr)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
```



## Part I
Import data from [Ghost Crab Burrow Morphology and Distribution](https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6895109).
```{r,echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
burrow_dimensions_raw <- read.csv("../Data/Ghost_crab_burrow_architecture.csv")
Burrow_tibble <- as_tibble(burrow_dimensions_raw)
knitr::kable(head(Burrow_tibble[, 1:5]), "simple")
```



## Slide with Plot
```{r pressure}
plot(pressure)
```
